channel.title: _am1t tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from _am1t.

item.description: I didn‚Äôt know Wordle has a ‚ÄúHard‚Äù mode where ‚Äúany revealed hints must be used in subsequent guesses‚Äù. But even without the mode turned on, that‚Äôs how I have been playing this game. Why would you do it any other way?
A Stranger on the Wheels: [link]

I am exited by the Jurassic World Dominion trailer, mainly by the star cast from the original one. As I saw more, I wished the trailer ended with a screen that read ‚ÄúDirected by Steven Spielberg‚Äù. üé• [link]

I didn‚Äôt know today‚Äôs wordle word was a word. I knew the word, but I didn‚Äôt know it as a word. I can‚Äôt possibly have spoilt anything. I‚Äôve read what I‚Äôve written here twice now. But what I‚Äôve written here won‚Äôt make sense if I didn‚Äôt know what it‚Äôs supposed to mean. Makes sense?

I like the new Galaxy S22 devices, especially the non-Ultra ones. If the rumour that Samsung might finally launch with Snapdragon processor in India is true, I might seriously consider the non-plus variant. Plus the downslide that OnePlus is on makes this decision a lot easier.

I now have 3 posts in draft, unpublished, because I‚Äôm not yet satisfied. Another reason why I‚Äôve more micro posts than the long-form ones. I feel a sense of attachment to the stuff I post on my blog. The stuff I wrote on Twitter and other platform can get lost. Literally.
Letters from Tikwadi ‚Äì A Story in Post: [link]

I have released an upgrade 1.0.4 to the Paper theme today. There are no visible changes, just fixes for a few issues that I have observed or have been reported to me. Mainly with archive page, custom CSS and plugin CSS & files. Let me know if you ... [link]
A morning during a train ride, in a foreign land, an unknown city is always beautiful. Curious how we connect to a rising sun, irrespective of the place. Day 30 of #30day üñºÔ∏è [link]
I love the play of yellows here. The light highlights a shade that‚Äôs already lovely. Day 29 of #30day üñºÔ∏è [link] https://t.co/aMh3Nhc39G
A scene so normal, a plain boring. Or something so dramatic that looms overhead. Well, no one can tell. Day 28 of #30day üñºÔ∏è [link] https://t.co/1syL6cW8VR
A morning walk skipped for a relaxing cup of tea with my wife. Basking in the morning sunlight. A deal that I will take any day. Day 27 of #30day üñºÔ∏è [link] https://t.co/Hw4OnKM83A
From my morning walk today. It felt dramatic some time, it felt serene another. It was neither. And both at the same time. Day 26 of #30day üñºÔ∏è [link] https://t.co/xQH7hEFwcx
